description:
Today, I am looking for feedback on the concept (see details below) before continuing the development. If some people feel it interresting, I will continue. If not, I have lot of other projects I would like to work on.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

First step: (exit proto)

  • Exit prototype phase (more stable / more optimised / menus / saves...).

  • PS4 gamepad support (and other on demand).

  • Work the flying fellings (long terme work).

  • Extend environment customization possibilities.

  • Basic ambiance sounds/music.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Second step: (multiplayer)
  • Make the game a MULTIPLAYER EXPERIENCE (basic contact and share tools).
  • Explore the loop "CREATE - MEET - SHARE" based on the visual customization of the environment. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Third step: (global environment)
  • Build an automatic link system to create a DYNAMIC GLOBAL ENVIRONMENT in witch the players could navigate together.
  • I have hundred of ideas (multiplayer interactions, environment extension, visuals, customizations, data sharing, UI design...), but I think it is to early to talk about all of this becouse it might deeply evoluate depending on feedbacks and suggestions (note that I'm just not interested in competitive experiences).

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you are interrested you can:

  • Leave a comment.

  • Take a look to my first game or my actual project .

  • And of course, share to your friends!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Current Development Statut :
  • Development suspended, but feel free to leave a comment, I'am still here but I work on this.
